FuncDef: The password min-length command configures the minimum length of a password. The undo password min-length command restores the minimum length of a password to the default value. The default value is 8

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the minimum length of a password.
The value is an integer that ranges from 8 to 128. The default is 8.

ExtraInfo: To prevent security risks such as account stealing, run this command to raise password strength requirements.
